property.name: Description
property.value: Discard: cure up to 2 standard wounds or afflictions on a target.

property.name: Description
property.value: Discard a card from your hand. Return 1 item from the discard pile into play.

property.name: Description
property.value: If you are at 5 or less health, cure 2 standard wounds and 1 wound or affliction. Otherwise, cure 2 standard wounds.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [CURE, CHARACTER, [EQUAL, [TYPE, CHECKED], "Standard"]], [CURE, CHARACTER, [EQUAL, [TYPE, CHECKED], "Standard"]], [ON, [LTE, [HEALTH], 5], [CURE, CHARACTER, TRUE]]

property.name: Description
property.value: Discard: convert 1 of your normal, non-standard wounds to a standard wound.

property.name: Use_Script
property.value: [DISCARD, THIS], [REMOVENORMALWOUNDS, [CHOOSENORMALWOUND, "Which wound are you converting?", [OWNER, THIS], [NOT, [EQUAL, TYPE, "Standard"]]]], [TAKEWOUNDS, 1, "Standard"]

property.name: Description
property.value: Discard: convert 1 of your afflictions to a wound of the same type.

property.name: Use_Script
property.value: [DISCARD, THIS], [GETTARGET, [AND, [EQUAL, [TYPE, CHECKED], "Affliction"], [EQUAL, [OWNER, CHECKED], CHARACTER]], TABLE], [CONVERTAFFLICTION, TARGET, [SUBTYPE, TARGET]]

property.name: Description
property.value: When you retreat, draw 2 fewer cards and convert Limping to a normal standard wound.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [GETENEMY], [IF, [NORMALWOUNDS, TARGET, "Standard"], [AFFLICT, [GETWOUND, TARGET, "Standard"], THIS], [FAIL, "That target does not have any standard wounds."]]

property.name: Description
property.value: At the start of your turn, lose 1 stamina. You may discard 2 cards from your hand to convert Staggered to a normal standard wound.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [GETENEMY], [IF, [NORMALWOUNDS, TARGET, "Standard"], [AFFLICT, [GETWOUND, TARGET, "Standard"], THIS], [FAIL, "That target does not have any standard wounds."]]

property.name: Description
property.value: You may not play two cards of the same type (Attack, Spell, Affliction, Tactic) in a single turn.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [GETENEMY], [IF, [NORMALWOUNDS, TARGET, "Standard"], [AFFLICT, [GETWOUND, TARGET, "Standard"], THIS], [FAIL, "That target does not have any standard wounds."]]

property.name: Constant_Script
property.value: [-1, [ON, [THISTURN, [EQUAL, [TYPE, CHECKED], TYPE]], [FAIL, "You are too exhausted to play another card of that type."]]]

property.name: Description
property.value: At the start of your turn, take 1 standard wound. Cure Weariness when you retreat.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [GETENEMY], [IF, [NORMALWOUNDS, TARGET, "Standard"], [AFFLICT, [GETWOUND, TARGET, "Standard"], THIS], [FAIL, "That target does not have any standard wounds."]]

property.name: Description
property.value: Gain 2 stamina. At the start of your next turn, lose 1 stamina.

property.name: Description
property.value: Choose a target. That target loses 3 mana.

property.name: Description
property.value: 1 stamina, discard: Return 1 item from the discard pile into play.
